text: The Girls He Left Behind Him and The Iron Clad Lover is a 1910 American silent comedy movie.THE GIRLS HE LEFT BEHIND HIM It stars G.W. Abbe, Justus D. Barnes, and Frank H. Crane. ==References== Category:1910 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Girls He Left Behind Him and The Iron Clad Lover
